name: Doctor Timmy
description:
Synopsis

On the night of the winter science fair things didn't go as planned for Timmy, but now that he's travelled back in time he can fix everything. All he needs to do is execute a plan he hasn't fully thought out while dealing with time logic and a growing web of lies.

Features
  • Kinetic visual novel
  • Abut 5.5k words
  • 3 sprites
  • School setting
  • Confusion
  • Paradoxes

Warning: This game contains a swear or two. Don't tell mom.

Credits

Derek Chaplin (Wolfborg) - Writing, Programming, Sprites

Music: "Antlers" by Kubbi

Note: The project is a rough version I made for Winter VN Jam 2020.
I ended up only having three days to work on it. Be gentle.
